data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Donets‘k, Ukraine, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Donets‘k, Ukraine
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Donets'k unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 27 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Donets‘k, Ukraine be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, help the 167,540 believers in Donets'k to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Chechen people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Chechen people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Chechen people is yours.
Lord we pray you unite the 167,540 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Donets'k.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Donets'k who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary:
the state of Donets‘k, Ukraine has a population of 4,622,900.

We estimate Donets'k has 167,540 people who might know Jesus, 3,195,404 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,259,956 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 27 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Donets'k with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.
